pages.text: Wandering clerics offer a limited assortment of potions if you can afford them and you don't ask where the merchant got them. $(br2)Specifically, they offer potions of water breathing, fire resistance, slow falling and rarely an awkward potion.
$(#999999)By purchasing a potion you agree that you have read a list of possible side effects (available on merchant's web site) and you agree that there are no refunds.$(reset)
